product_name: Surftech Surftech Blacktip Stand Up Paddleboard with Paddle - 11' 6"
long_description: The Surftech Blacktip 11 ft. 6 in. stand up paddleboard with paddle is specifically shaped for large novice paddlers, yet offers enough versatility to delight even the seasoned wave shredder. Highly stable 34 in. width and flat bottom enhance stability; 11 ft. 6 in. length performs well on flatwater and light surf. Fiberglass lamination over a foam core offers high value, responsive stiffness and reliable durability. Grab handles and center handle make it easy to transport to the water. Includes a Surftech adjustable aluminum paddle. Surftech aluminum paddle adjusts from 67 - 83 in. and features a 16.5 x 8.5 in. blade.
short_description: The Surftech Blacktip 11 ft. 6 in. stand up paddleboard with paddle is specifically shaped for large novice paddlers, yet offers enough versatility to delight even the seasoned wave shredder.
